```{r}
library(microbenchmark)
library(ampir)
library(protr)


seq <- "MALTVRIQAACLLLLLLASLTSYSLLLSQTTQLADLQTQDTAGATAGLMPGLQRRRRRDTHFPICIFCCGCCYPSKCGICCKT"

extractPAAC(seq,lambda = 4)
ampir:::calc_pseudo_comp(seq,lambda=4)

microbenchmark(extractPAAC(seq,lambda = 4),ampir:::calc_pseudo_comp(seq,lambda=4))

```
